text: Jagmohan Malhotra (25 September 1927 - 3 May 2021), known by the mononym Jagmohan, was an Indian politician and member of the Bharatiya Janata Party. He was the Lieutenant Governor of Delhi and Goa, as well as the Governor of Jammu and Kashmir. He was also elected to the Lok Sabha (the lower house of the Indian Parliament) and was the Union Minister for Urban Development and Tourism. Jagmohan died on 3 May 2021 in New Delhi, India at the age of 93.Former J&K; Governor Jagmohan passes away ==References== Category:2021 deaths Category:1927 births Category:People from Jammu and Kashmir Category:Lieutenant Governors of Delhi Category:Governors of Goa Category:Administrators of Dadra and Nagar Haveli Category:Members of the Lok Sabha
title: Jagmohan
